narrative: In a neon-lit labyrinth of apartments, a euphoric night unfolds as the main character beckons you to an address where reality blurs into fantasy, before the dawn breaks.
character_details: mehulagarwal, leather jacket, white t-shirt, black jeans
newNarrative: the main character is alone in the entire music video in a luxury hotel room in Seoul. He is looking out the window at the distant view of countless apartment buildings dotting the Seoul skyline. He is lonely but trying to have fun alone.
